title: The Reaper's Cloak
description: Lincoln is finally free of Harksmear, yet he is plagued by horrific dreams - dreams that tell of an unchecked danger left in the Spring of Life. Returning to New York to begin his training as an Ascendant, life is not as he thought it would be. The Reaper is making moves, ordering his Ravaged to attack anybody and everybody in sight.Ben, reeling from what he had to do in the Spring of Life has focused all his attention on retrieving Liv's soul. He is led down a path of a long-lost group who may be the only people who know how to defeat the Reaper.Kristina has finally avenged her sister, but now she is faced with an impossible choice - return to her life of luxury or stay in Abonerra and help Marshal Aldefos overturn the Sorcerer laws that abolished her people from their homeland.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
